overview:
Was Captain of Women’s Swimming Team at a Division I school, held a record and managed to be Top 10 all time in 10 events during her years.

As a Trainer, was a Tier III with ACE PT, C.H.E.K Exercise Coach, TRX, Kettlebell, Pure Yoga, EYRT Certifications. As a Master Instructor, taught both series of classes: Foundations and Detailed Sciences to Tier I and Tier II Personal Trainers at Equinox, SF.

Currently is the President and Co-Founder of Yufit, Inc. Started project in March 2011 and after 6 months of private beta testing, launched on Jan 10, 2012. A visionary striving to make her first startup into something truly revolutionary.
